entry.title: 小行星的軌道參數
entry.content:
六個軌道參數的物理意義

  • semi-major axis和eccentricity這兩個參數主要是用來描述軌道形狀大小;
  • 而inclination和longitude of the ascending node 這兩個參數在描述軌道平面相較於黃道面(as reference frame)的擺放角度和位置;
  • 最後argument of perihelion 用來描述天體近日點的和升交點的相對角度。
  • mean anomaly 則用來描述該天體某時間點(t0)的位置。

entry.title: Tisserand relation
entry.content:
Tisserand Relation T_J

Date: January 12, 2021 Keywords: Asteroid, Comets, Homework Note: Course : Comets and Asteroids

Consider a comet is not close with initial semi-major \(a\), eccentricity \(e\), inclination \(i\). After encountering Jupiter, the orbital element of the comet becomes semi-major \(a'\), eccentricity \(e'\), inclination \(i'\)

From the Jacobi integral \(C_J\), it remains constant value throughout the encounter with the masses \(^{[3]}\).

\[ C_J = 2V - v^2 \\ = 2(\frac{\mu_1}{r_1}+\frac{\mu_2}{r_2}) + 2n(\dot x' y' - x' \dot y') - ( \dot x'^2 + \dot y'^2 + \dot z'^2 ) \\\]

For instance in Sun-Jupiter-comet problem, because the mass of Jupiter is smaller than Sun \((M_j \sim 10^{-3}M_\odot)\), we take \(\mu_1\) and \(r_1\) as the unity.

\[GM_\odot = \mu_1 = \mu\]

\[ r_1 = r\]

When the comet is not close to Jupiter, so that \(\frac{\mu_2}{r_2}\) term is always small to neglect the \(\mu_2\) term.

\[\frac{\mu_2}{r_2} \ll \frac{\mu_1}{r_1}=\frac{\mu}{r}\]

Where \(\mu_2 = GM_J\), \(r_2\) is the distance between Jupiter and the comet.

Then, we can consider the approximation of two-body problem between Sun and comet. From the orbital energy of Sun-comet two-body problem.

\[E = \frac{1}{2}(\ddot x^2 +\ddot y^2 +\ddot z^2 ) - \frac{G(M_\odot+ m_{comet})}{r_1} = -\frac{G(M_\odot+ m_{comet})}{2a} \]

Here, \(G(M_\odot+ m_{comet}) \approx GM_\odot = \mu_1 = \mu\), so we calculate the velocity

\[v^2 = (\ddot x^2 +\ddot y^2 +\ddot z^2 ) = G(M_\odot+ m_{comet})(\frac{2}{r_1}-\frac{1}{a})\]

\[\implies v^2 = \mu(\frac{2}{r}-\frac{1}{a})\]

For the angular momentum of the orbit

\[ \vec{h} = \vec{r} \times \vec{\dot r} = n\sqrt{a(1-e^2)GM} \\ = n\sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} = constant \]

For the orbital energy,

\[ E = \vec h \cdot \vec n \\ = h \cdot n \cos{i} \\ = n\sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot n \cos{i}\]

the \(z'\) component of \(\vec h\) is given by

\[ 2n(\dot x' y' - x' \dot y') =  h \cdot n \cos{i}\]

So, Jocobi integral \(C_J\) becomes

\[ C_J = 2V - v^2 \\ = 2(\frac{\mu_1}{r_1}+\frac{\mu_2}{r_2}) + 2n(\dot x' y' - x' \dot y') - ( \dot x'^2 + \dot y'^2 + \dot z'^2 ) \\ ~~~~ (\because \frac{\mu_1}{r_1} \gg \frac{\mu_2}{r_2}\approx 0 , \mu_1\approx\mu, r_1 \approx r ) \\ = \frac{2\mu}{r} + 2n(\dot x' y' - x' \dot y')- v^2 \\ = \frac{2\mu}{r} + 2h \cdot n \cos{i} - (\frac{2\mu}{r}- \frac{\mu}{a}) \\ = \frac{\mu}{a} + 2h \cdot n \cos{i} \\ = \frac{\mu}{a} + 2 \cdot n\sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot n \cos{i} \\ ~~~~ (\because n= 1) \\ = \frac{\mu}{a} + 2\sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot \cos{i}\]

\[C_J = \frac{\mu}{a} + 2\sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot \cos{i}  \approx constant \]

If the comet is not close to Jupiter, so that \(\frac{1}{r_2}\) is always small to neglect the \(\mu_2\) term in Equation , then we have

\[ T_J = \frac{1}{2} C_J = \frac{\mu}{2a} + \sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot \cos{i}  \approx constant \]

Therefore, the approximate relationship with the orbital element of the comet before and after encountering with Jupiter is given by

\[T_J = \frac{\mu}{2a} + \sqrt{a(1-e^2)\mu} \cdot \cos{i} = \frac{\mu}{2a'} + \sqrt{a'(1-e'^2)\mu} \cdot \cos{i'} \]

By measuring the orbital elements of the comet, we can check whether the comet is new observed, or is the passage of a previously observed comet scattered by a close encounter with Jupiter.

entry.title: Install the Linus system on Windows
entry.content:
中文版

Step 1 啟用Windows Linus System

需要先啟用 Windows Linux Subsystem 功能。需在『開啟或關閉 Windows 功能中設定』，剛裝完畢後，需要重新開機。

Step 2 安裝Ubuntu

接著到Windows Store 裡就有 Ubuntu App 可以選擇安裝

安裝成功後，就可以在 Windows 選單找到 Ubuntu App

  • 啟動Ubuntu後卻發現出現錯誤訊息…..

    這表示Windows-Subsystem-Linux (WSL)還沒打開，因此可以用接下來的方法解決。

Step 3 開啟PowerShell

輸入以下指令:

Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux

Step 4 啟動Ubuntu

安裝成功！

原本的 C/D/F 槽都 mount 在 /mnt 下

輸入cd /mnt/c/Users/*Name/Desktop

*Name: 根據自己的電腦名稱去修改

Step 5 更新套件

輸入 sudo apt-get update

Done!

English version

Step 1. Turn on Windows Linux Subsystem

  1. Press “Windows” + “R” keys simultaneously to open the Run prompt.
  2. Type in “Control Panel”
  3. Click on the “Programs and Features” option.
  4. Select the “Turn Windows Features On or OFF” option in the left pane.
  5. Scroll down and select “Windows Subsystem for Linux“
  6. 6.Click on “OK” to enable the feature.

Step 2 Install Ubuntu

  1. Open the Microsoft Store from the Start menu, and search for “Ubuntu” in the store
  2. To install , click it, and then click the “Get” or “Install” button to install it like any other Store application.

Step 3 Turning WSL ON Through PowerShell

  1. Search for PowerShell, right-click the top result, and select the Run as administrator option.

  2. Type the following command to enable the Linux subsystem and press Enter:

    Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux

    Type Y and press Enter to confirm and restart your computer.

Step 4 Open Ubuntu

  1. Open Start, and click it .

It works!

Step 5 Update

This is the first time you are using your system after installing, you should run the update command: sudo apt-get update

Done!
